import React from "react"; import profile from "../images/me.jpeg"; import { FaRegEnvelope ,FaGithub, FaTwitter, FaDribbble, FaLinkedin } from "react-icons/fa"; function Card({ name, title, social: { github, dribbble, twitter, email } }) { return (

{name}

{title}

Github Linkedin Twitter Email
); } export default Card;
